summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Lucky Wheel website. All backend APIs working perfectly (12/12 tests passed). Frontend UI fully functional with wheel animation, confetti celebration, admin dashboard, and mobile responsiveness.
passed_tests: POST /api/admin/login with correct password returns token
POST /api/spin with valid unused code returns prize and updates history
POST /api/spin with used code returns 'already been used' error
POST /api/spin with invalid credentials returns error
Frontend main page loads with Lucky Wheel and all components
Admin login page works with correct/wrong password validation
Admin dashboard tabs (Codes, Prizes, Stats) all functional
Admin code generation and listing works
Admin prize pool editing and saving works
Wheel spinning with valid credentials shows animation and confetti
Win modal displays correctly with celebration
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (12/12 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (All UI components and interactions working)
